name: WhichLanguage
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: which language
des: In this fun game for world travellers, you listen to someone saying "Hello", "One two three" or "I love you" and guess what language it is. Perhaps you think it's easy for French, German and Spanish, but how about Icelandic, Korean and Turkish? If you don't know, say "help" to get a hint.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
